Managed Object - LocalizationManager

Property of
ServiceContent
See also
LocalizationManagerMessageCatalog
Since
vSphere API 4.0


Managed Object Description

This managed object type presents all the message catalogs for client-side localization of messages.

Properties

Name Type Description
catalog* PLocalizationManagerMessageCatalog[]

Fetches the descriptions of all the client-side localization message catalogs available for the current session locale.
*May not be presentP Required privilege: System.View

Methods

Methods defined in this Managed Object
None
